# image

**Instance Property**

The contact’s image.

## Declaration

```swift
var image: UIImage { get set }
```

## Discussion

Provide an image that is display-ready. If necessary, provide light and dark variants using an asset catalog, or use an instance of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIImageAsset] and register an image for each interface style. To properly size your image, use the display scale of the vehicle’s primary screen, which you access from your interface controller’s [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPInterfaceController/carTraitCollection] property.

CarPlay doesn’t support animated images. If you provide an animated image, CarPlay uses only the first image in the animation sequence.

## Configuring the Contact’s Attributes

- **name**: The contact’s name.
- **subtitle**: A subtitle that the template displays in addition to the contact’s name.
- **informativeText**: Additional text that the template displays.
